##Introduction
Knitr is an R package that generate reports using R code. The R code is intigrated into the following languages: LaTex, LyX, HTML, Markdown, and AsciiDoc (text document format).
This tutorial uses Knitr to create an arthimetic article in RStudio. We will covering addition, subtraction, division, multiplication, and plotting. 

#Setup
To create an article in R, first select <b>Global Options</b> under <b>Tools</b>.Select <b>Sweave</b> (7th option down), weave Rnw files with <b>Knitr</b>. Next, create a <b>New File</b>, with RSweave. We are now ready to begin.
